## Properties

| Property           | Attribute  | Description           | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------ | ---------- | --------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active`           | `active`   | set active tab        | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`         | `disabled` | Enable or disable tab | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `tab` _(required)_ | `tab`      | Unique tab id         | `string`  | `undefined` |
